name: Muskmelon Panaka
description: A tasy Ayurvedic summer cooler made using muskmelon,jaggery and green cardamom
directions: In a blender add half of  the chopped muskmelon and the powdered jaggery
Blend the mixture until it's completely mashed
Add cold water, lime juice and cardamom powder
Blend the mixture again till everything gets mixed
Water and jaggery can be adjusted based on personal preference
Strain the blended mixture into a jar and add the remaining half of chopped muskmelon
